description: REFERENCE ONLY: Exhaustive test of all 20 parameters with 3 reasonable values each. This creates 3^20 = 3,486,784,401 possible combinations. NOT for actual execution - computational cost would be ~66,339 years at 10 min/sim or 111 years at 1 sec/sim. This file serves as a reference for the full parameter space and reasonable value ranges. For actual optimization, use the focused strategy in phase1_iteration2_injury_bye_focus.json which tests only high-impact parameters.
